TableField.name: ProdServID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track products and services

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization producing the product and/or service

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization producing the product and/or service

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this product or service

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this product or service

TableField.name: ProductServiceTypeID
TableField.phrase: Product or Service Type|A combined field used to describe this product or service type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ProductorServiceID
ForeignField.phrase: Product or Service|Whether this is a product or service

CodeField.name: ProductorService
CodeField.phrase: Product or Service|Whether this is a product or service

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group products or services of similar types

CodeField.name: ProductServiceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group products or services of similar types

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceTypeTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Type|A title or phrase used to describe the specific product or service type

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the specific type of product or service
ForeignField.sample: Bulk skinless almonds are shipped in a pallet box weighing 1200 pounds.

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceType
ForeignField.phrase: Product or Service Type|A combined field used to describe this product or service type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: ProdServName
TableField.phrase: Name|The name used by the organization to identify the product or service

TableField.name: ProdServDesc
TableField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of the product and/or service
TableField.sample: The Monterey Frozen Burrito comes in four variaties: Bean, Beef, Beef and Bean; and, Cheese.

TableField.name: ProdServOrigDate
TableField.phrase: Origination Date|Date the product or service originated as a product or service of the organization

TableField.name: ProdServTrackingNo
TableField.phrase: Tracking Number|The unique tracking number assigned to the product or service

TableField.name: SKUNo
TableField.phrase: SKU Number|Stock Keeping Unit number associated with a product for inventory purposes

TableField.name: ProductLifeCycleID
TableField.phrase: Product Life Cycle|The current product life cycle stage

CodeField.name: ProductLifeCycle
CodeField.phrase: Product Life Cycle|The current product life cycle stage

TableField.name: ProdServStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|The present status of the product or service

CodeField.name: ProdServStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|The present status of the product or service

TableField.name: ProdServDiscontinued
TableField.phrase: Discontinued|Check this box if this product or service has been discontinued

TableField.name: DiscontinuedDate
TableField.phrase: Discontinued Date|Date the product or service was discontinued

TableField.name: TraceMarkings
TableField.phrase: Trace Markings|Describe how trace markings are applied to the product or packaging and how they would be identified by a customer or consumer
TableField.sample: Each package has a label printed by the packaging machine before it is palletized. The trace marking is located on the bottom of the box and is easily identified by the consumer

TableField.name: TraceMarkingDestructibility
TableField.phrase: Marking Indestructible|Whether the trace markings are indestructible

TableField.name: ProductionRecords
TableField.phrase: Production Identity Records|Describe how production records identify component parts and raw materials by batch or lot number, serial number, or supplier
TableField.sample: Production Run Sheets record batch numbers, serial numbers produced and supplier ingredients for each lot.

TableField.name: ProcessRecords
TableField.phrase: Process Identity Records|Describe how process records are maintained by each process participant (e.g. production, shipping and sales) and which trace markings (Batch/lot/serial numbers; Model Number; SKU Number; Shipping Date; Customer; etc.) are recorded by each participants
TableField.sample: Production records X, Shipping records Y, and Sales records Z.

TableField.name: TraceMarkingSample
TableField.phrase: Trace Sample|Whether a sample of the trace marking method has been scanned and attached to this record

TableField.name: ProductionRecordSample
TableField.phrase: Production Sample|Whether a sample of the production record tracking method has been scanned and attached to this record

TableField.name: ShippingRecordSample
TableField.phrase: Shipping Sample|Whether a sample of the shipping record tracking method has been scanned and attached to this record

TableField.name: SalesRecordSample
TableField.phrase: Sales Sample|Whether a sample of the sales record tracking method has been scanned and attached to this record

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the product or service

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the product or service

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: ProdServ
CombinedField.phrase: Product or Service|A combined field used to describe this product or service when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Product - Retail Food - Monterey Frozen Burrito - Bean; MB-B-2003-P14

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about a products and/or service

ViewField.name: IncidentReport
ViewField.sample: Thorslund Discrimination Claim; Active Agenda, HQ; 10-28-2003; 1

ViewField.name: MannerAffected
ViewField.sample: The customer bit down on a Monterey Burrito and claims she broke her tooth.

EditScreen.phrase: Standards|Associate standards with the product or service

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
